Performer:
Takemoto Oritayū V (see also Takemoto Tsunatayū IX) (竹本織大夫 (五))

Alternate Name: Takemoto Tsunatayū IX (竹本綱大夫 (九))

Dates: '1963/01-'

Specialty: Tayu

Notes: Bunraku meikan (1980, 1985, 1988, 1990, 1994)


– Click image to view.
